page.title: 05WASHINGBOROUGH JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: WASHINGBOROUGH COUNTY JUNIOR SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1903.THE SCHOOL HAS 249 CHILDREN RANGING FROM THE 1ST YEARS 7 YRS OLD UP TO THE 4TH YRS 11YRS OLD.THERE ARE 8 TEACHERS,MR MASON,MR WILSON,MR EDWARDS,MRS THOMPSON,MRS JUDD,MRS HORSFIELD,MRS DALE AND MRS ELLIS. MR BURN OUR HEADMASTER HAS BEEN WORKING AT THE SCHOOL FOR 18\ YEARS. MRS WALDRON OUR SECRETARY HAS BEEN WORKING MORE THAN 18\ YEARS.MRS WALDRON WAS A SECRATERY BEFORE MR BURN CAME HERE.MR BURN IS RETIRING ON JULY 19TH.1985 AND MR EDWARDS WILL BE ACTING HEADMASTER IN SEPTEMBER. IN 1903 THE HEADMISTRESS WAS A MRS. ROSA CONSTANCE BAYLISS.THERE WERE 91 CHILDREN WHEN THE SCHOOL FIRST OPENED.A MONITORESS CALLED MISS SMITH WAS AT THE FIRST SCHOOL FOR 50 YEARS.
